summary: An email from attorney Bobbi C. Sternheim to an unspecified recipient (likely the Bureau of Prisons or MDC staff) urgently inquiring about the status of four items of legal mail for Ghislaine Maxwell that were listed as 'Available for Pickup' but not yet retrieved by the Metropolitan Detention Center (MDC). The email threatens legal action if there is no immediate response.

persons.name: Bobbi C. Sternheim
persons.context: Attorney representing Ghislaine Maxwell, sending an urgent email demanding confirmation of the status of Maxwell's legal mail and threatening to file a court order.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: The incarcerated individual whose legal mail is at issue; she has not received legal mail in over a week according to her attorney.

persons.name: Christian Everdell
persons.context: Copied on the email from Bobbi C. Sternheim regarding the status of Ghislaine Maxwell's legal mail.

persons.name: Isabel Maxwell
persons.context: Identified as a paralegal at Leah Saffian, Inc., and is the sender of the forwarded email notice; her contact information is provided for error notification.

persons.name: Leah Saffian
persons.context: Attorney whose law office is associated with the forwarded email notice; the notice is from her law offices.

connections.description: Sternheim is acting as Maxwell's attorney, advocating for her access to legal mail while incarcerated.
Isabel Maxwell is identified as a paralegal working for Leah Saffian, Inc./Law Offices of Leah Saffian.

events.title: Urgent Inquiry Regarding Ghislaine Maxwell's Legal Mail
events.description: Attorney Bobbi C. Sternheim sends an urgent email stating that four items of legal mail for Ghislaine Maxwell are listed as 'Available for Pickup' but have not been retrieved by MDC, and Maxwell has not received legal mail in over a week.

locations: Metropolitan Detention Center (MDC) - implied location where Ghislaine Maxwell is held
225 Broadway, Suite 715, New York, NY 10007 - Law Offices of Bobbi C. Sternheim
11420 Santa Monica Blvd #25424, Los Angeles, CA 90025 - Law Offices of Leah Saffian
keyFacts: Ghislaine Maxwell had not received legal mail for over a week as of October 29, 2021.
Four items of legal mail for Maxwell were listed as 'Available for Pickup' by USPO tracking but had not been retrieved by the Metropolitan Detention Center (MDC).
Attorney Bobbi C. Sternheim threatened to file an order to show cause requiring the recipient's presence in court if there was no immediate response regarding the mail.
The document highlights potential issues with Maxwell's access to legal counsel and materials while incarcerated.
The correspondence includes a standard legal confidentiality notice from the Law Offices of Bobbi C. Sternheim.
